enumDescriptions: The update will propagate to clients within several minutes on average and up to a few hours in rare cases. Throughput is limited to 7,200 updates per app per hour.
The update will propagate to clients within 24 hours. Supports high throughput of up to 720,000 updates per app per hour using batch modification methods.
